user_query: I'm organizing a conference next month and I need to send messages to all the attendees. Can you fetch the sent message extras for a specific message ID? Also, fetch the list of birthday groups from the Zigatext API to send personalized birthday messages to our clients.

TaskList.description: Fetch sent message extras for the specific message ID.
Fetch the list of birthday groups from the Zigatext API.
Using the fetched birthday groups, send personalized birthday messages to the clients.
